main event: A UFO was observed over Norman Mesa, Nevada on 2 January 1960, described as having a blue and bright yellow flame and appeared like a missile.
interesting points: The sighting involved one object moving at a high altitude of 20,000 to 25,000 feet., The observation lasted for a maximum of 5 seconds., The object moved steadily in a southwest direction at a rapid speed., Two civilian airlines reported spotting the object, but radar was unable to pick it up., The source reliability of the report is considered probably very good.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with blue and bright yellow flame
witness description: pilot crew and passengers aboard United Airlines Flight 140
